column3: Use ‘LS’ and ‘RS’ to move and look.$Click ‘A’ to plant in fertile soil.
Go to the door and hold ‘A’ to sleep.
Press LB/RB to switch seeds.$Plants need to be close to eachother, or they will wither and die.
Trees require many plants to be supported.$Otherwise they will wither and die.
Each tree greatly enriches the soil around it, giving you more space to grow.
Press X to delete a plant.
